channel.title: Easy to Install Linux
channel.description: Hi. Does anyone know of a easyt to install linux, like mayby one with an installation thing? I tried gentoo, and i had to go threw this 99 page set up thing, so i gave up, and now im back with windows :( Also, is moparscape able to run on linux? and can you make a server? Also, is there a linux that works with wirerless? my desktop computer is connected threw a wireerless adapter

item.title: Easy to Install Linux
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Ubuntu is easy to install. Yes, Moparscape runs on Linux. Yes, every distro of linux will support wireless with the appropriate drivers/kernel modules/tools (although Ubuntu will support it out of the box, most of the time).

Read full topic
